business.headline: Trump's tariffs could hurt US, but an opportunity for India: Ruchir SharmaRuchir Sharma believes India's emerging role in global trade could reshape its economic future, with a potential influx of investment as the US faces trade challenges and shifts in global capital flows.

Opting for new tax regime? Check out these 5 benefitsThe revisions introduced under the new tax regime aim to make the new regime easier, cut down on paperwork, and minimise the confusion many individuals experience in filing their returns.

Infosys Q4 results: Profit drops 12%, final dividend set at Rs 22The IT major clocked revenue of Rs 40,925 crore for the March quarter, up 8% from Rs 37,923 crore a year ago. In constant currency terms, revenue grew 4.8% YoY but declined 3.5% sequentially.

No public listing in 2 months: Where have IPOs disappeared?Just nine companies have listed on the mainboard till April this year, compared to 25 in the same period last year, and most didn't even leave a mark.
Sensex, Nifty rebound to end nearly 2% higher as banking stocks rallyThe S&P BSE Sensex ended 1508.91 higher at 78,553.20, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 414.45 points higher at 23,851.65.
Sunscreen faceoff: Honasa vs HUL in court over ad claimsThe core of the argument is SPF, the sun protection factor which measures how well a sunscreen protects against harmful UV rays.

Flipkart ends WFH policy, asks all employees to work from office: ReportFlipkart had initially offered flexibility to employees during the pandemic. But over the past year, the company began rolling back the policy in phases—first calling senior executives back to office. Now, the mandate applies to all employees, regardless of role or function.

Vijay Kedia warns of 10 red flags to spot a potential scam amid Gensol fraudInvestor and market expert Vijay Kedia has warned that Gensol is not the only company with problems amid the findings by Sebi.

Rs 25 lakh in India or $100K in US? Bengaluru techie weighs in on what's betterChoosing to stay in India means staying close to family, celebrating festivals, and living within a culture you know well, said the tech professional.

PhonePe rolls out UPI Circle, simplifies payments for family and friendsUPI Circle is a feature by NPCI (National Payments Corporation of India) where a primary user gives permission to a secondary user to make payments from their UPI account, within set limits.

Sebi's job is to find and punish them: Tuhin Kanta Pandey on Gensol fraudThe Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) released an interim order on April 15, stating that Gensol Engineering's promoters, brothers Anmol and Puneet Singh Jaggi, had diverted company funds for personal use.

Surprise rally lights up Dalal Street, Sensex jumps 1,500 points. Here's whyShare market today: Despite a slight uptick in volatility, sentiment turned decisively positive as fears around global trade tensions began to fade. Broader market indices joined the rally, reflecting widespread optimism among investors.

entertainment.headline: Fantastic Four trailer: Marvel's 1st family sets out to defend Earth from GalactusThe first trailer for 'Fantastic Four: The First Steps' introduces Marvel's First Family with a new twist. The film will arrive in theatres on July 25, 2025.

Tamannaah Bhatia to play Bipasha Basu-like role in No Entry 2: ReportActor Tamannaah Bhatia might have been approached to play one of the leads in Boney Kapoor's 'No Entry 2'. The film already features Varun Dhawan, Arjun Kapoor and Diljit Dosanjh as leads.

Asim Riaz out of Battleground after fight with Abhishek Malhan, Rubina Dilaik?Asim Riaz has reportedly been removed from the reality show Battleground following a heated altercation with co-judges Abhishek Malhan and Rubina Dilaik. The incident escalated after an initial disagreement during the shoot, leading to the cancellation of filming for the day.

L2 Empuraan OTT release: When and where to watch Mohanlal, Prithviraj filmThe highly successful Malayalam film 'L2: Empuraan', directed by Prithviraj Sukumaran and starring Mohanlal, will soon be available for streaming. The film, which faced controversy over its depiction of communal riots, will be on JioHotstar from April 24.

Kesari 2 advance booking Day 1: Akshay Kumar's film off to decent start at box officeAkshay Kumar's latest release, 'Kesari 2', seems to be starting on a decent note, and if it receives good word-of-mouth, the film has great potential to finally bring Kumar back into the big leagues at the box office.

Daredevil Born Again: Does the revival deliver, and is season two worth the wait?The revival of 'Daredevil: Born Again' brought a fresh storyline and new cast, sparking excitement among fans. As Matt Murdock's dual life unfolds, the series balanced action with deep character development.

Grimes slams beauty standards after Sephora ad interrupts podcastGrimes slams Sephora ad interruption on Apple Podcasts, calling it a "demonic AI wraith" invading her peaceful moment. The singer voiced concerns about beauty standards, AI, and their impact on young women, especially her daughter.
Rapper Badshah's rare photo with daughter Jessemy, seen yet?Rapper Badshah posted a rare picture with his daughter, Jessemy, on Instagram. Fans praised the father-daughter duo.

The Life of Chuck trailer: Tom Hiddleston to headline this Stephen King adaptationNeon has unveiled the trailer for 'The Life of Chuck', a film adaptation of Stephen King's novella. Directed by Mike Flanagan, the movie stars Tom Hiddleston and is set for a June 6 release.

Actor Lakshmi Manchu's Instagram, phone number compromised, calls it scaryLakshmi Manchu's Instagram account was hacked, prompting the actor to respond with a quirky message. She assured fans that if she needed money, she'd ask directly, adding her signature humour to the situation.

Eijaz Khan, Pavitra Punia reunite for short film after breakup. Details hereActors Eijaz Khan and Pavitra Punia have reunited for a project after their breakup. Producer Dalljiet Kaur shares insights on their collaboration.

Ben Affleck on Jon Bernthal's The Punisher: I wouldn't tangle with himBen Affleck praises Jon Bernthal's intense take on The Punisher in Daredevil: Born Again, saying he "wouldn't tangle with him." While reflecting on Marvel's evolution, Affleck shares excitement for The Accountant 2 and his admiration for the darker tone Bernthal brings to Frank Castle.

Kian's Bizarre B&B review: Bigg Boss meets backpacker hostel in this BTS' Jin showReleased-Tue Apr 08, 2025Kian's Bizarre B&B is an eccentric reality show blending quirky humour and heartwarming moments, as BTS's Jin and actor Ji Ye-eun join host Kian84 in a makeshift guesthouse. The show offers a light-hearted, less dramatic alternative to Bigg Boss, with bizarre challenges and unexpected Indian references.

Caste, cinema and uncomfortable truths: Phule's delayed release journey explainedWhy has a film about India's two revolutionary thinkers upset the self-proclaimed caretakers of the Brahmin community? Did the caste-discrimination that Savitribai Phule and Jyotiba Phule fought against not exist in India? Is the country free from caste-based prejudices today?
Karan Johar reveals secret behind his weight loss, and it's not OzempicKaran Johar recently broke his silence over his drastic weight loss. The actor shared his secret behind the transformation.

Demi Moore finally breaks silence on losing Oscar to Anora star Mikey MadisonDemi Moore, 'The Substance' actor, revealed how she felt after losing the Oscar for Best Actress to Mikey Madison. Mikey bagged the award for her performance in the film 'Anora'.

Hailee Steinfeld: I was a crybaby on last day of shoot | ExclusiveHailee Steinfeld reflects on her emotional last day on the set of Ryan Coogler's upcoming vampire thriller 'Sinners', where she plays the role of Mary alongside Michael B Jordan. The film, which explores complex character dynamics and personal histories, is set to release in India on April 18.

Parvathy to Samantha, celebs wish Nazriya Nazim healing after emotional postAfter Nazriya Nazim shared a post explaining her social media absence, she received a lot of love from her industry colleagues and fans. Samantha, Parvathy, Tovino Thomas and several others wished her speedy recovery and healing.

YouTuber claims 'fake paneer served' at Gauri Khan's Torii, restaurant reactsA popular YouTuber alleged the use of fake paneer at Gauri Khan's high-end restaurant, Torii. The establishment addressed the claims and issued a response.

general news.headline: Trump's tariffs could hurt US, but an opportunity for India: Ruchir SharmaRuchir Sharma believes India's emerging role in global trade could reshape its economic future, with a potential influx of investment as the US faces trade challenges and shifts in global capital flows.

Russia denies attacking Indian pharma godown in Kyiv, blames Ukrainian missilesThe Russian embassy said that the "most likely explanation" for the fire at Indian pharma warehouse in Kyive is that "one of Ukrainian air defence missiles fell on Kusum Healthcare's warehouse setting it on fire".

Super Parliament: Vice President's no-holds-barred attack on Supreme CourtVice President Jagdeep Dhankhar expressed alarm at the judiciary stepping into roles reserved for the Executive and Legislature.

Illegal occupation: India slams Pak Army's 'Kashmir our jugular vein' commentPakistan Army Chief General Asim Munir's 'won't forget it' warning on Jammu and Kashmir drew a sharp reaction from India, with New Delhi urging Pakistan to hand over the 'illegally occupied territories,' referring to Pakistan-Occupied Kashmir.

Electric acne patches look cool and are viral. But do they even work?Electric acne patches with light therapy are wearable patches that use LED light (mostly blue, red, or both) to 'kill acne-causing bacteria, reduce inflammation, and speed up healing'. Indian influencers are obsessed with them.

MI vs SRH Live: Rohit departs for 26 in 163 chaseIPL 2025, Mumbai Indians (MI) vs SunRisers Hyderabad (SRH) live score and updates: Rohit Sharma has got out after a good start against Sunrisers Hyderabad as MI lost their first wicket on 32. The pitch has been a two-paced one with grip and turn on offer for bowlers.

BluSmart was a whiff of fresh air, but cleantech dirt choked itFor customers left at the mercy of last-minute ride cancellations and whimsical drivers, BluSmart was a breath of fresh air. Its courteous drivers with squeaky-clean EVs will be missed as BluSmart, ironically, falls victim to the dirt of cleantech. It has become another lesson to the Byjus chapter.

JEE Mains Result 2025 Live: JEE Main Session 2 -- When will scores be declared?JEE Mains Result 2025 is expected to be declared soon on the official website, but the exact timing remains uncertain. With the final answer key already out after reviewing all objections, all eyes are now on the result link.

RCB sues Uber over viral 'Hyderabaddie' ad featuring Travis HeadRCB, in its petition before the Delhi High Court, alleged that Uber disparaged its trademark in its YouTube ad, 'Baddies in Bengaluru ft. Travis Head'.

No waqf appointments, changes to waqf by user till next hearing: Supreme CourtThe Centre assured the Supreme Court that no appointments would be made to Waqf boards. The new law makes it compulsory to include non-Muslims as its members.

Dirty, eating fish: Non-veg row sparks Marathi vs Gujarati clash in MumbaiIn the video that has surfaced from the altercation, an MNS leader is heard saying, 'He thinks Marathis are dirty. That means Maharashtra is also dirty. So, why did he come to a dirty place?'

In India's quest for Rafale jets for navy, air force, why need overrides costA deal for 26 Rafale Marine jets for the navy is expected this month even as the IAF reportedly eyes more Rafale aircraft for its depleting fleet
Meet Tiffany Fong, the influencer who refused to make a baby with Elon Musk Crypto influencer Tiffany Fong turned down Elon Musk's offer to have his child. Read on to know more about Fong.

Indian-American doctor faces up to 130 years in USD 2.3-million goody-bags scamIndian-origin doctor Neil K Anand has been convicted by a federal jury in the US of committing healthcare fraud worth USD 2.3 million. Anand required patients to accept the 'goody bags', which were of no use to them to receive prescriptions for regulated drugs.
Paralysed man mistaken for patient while accompanying son, nearly operated onA man accompanying his son to hospital as attendant was mistaken as a patient and taken to the operation theatre.

Time to blow up can of worms: Vice President slams lack of FIR in cash-at-home rowQuestioning the lengthy constitutional process required to register an FIR against a sitting judge through the Chief Justice of India and the President, Dhankhar pointed out that even a constitutional functionary like him is not exempt from an FIR.

Caste, cinema and uncomfortable truths: Phule's delayed release journey explainedWhy has a film about India's two revolutionary thinkers upset the self-proclaimed caretakers of the Brahmin community? Did the caste-discrimination that Savitribai Phule and Jyotiba Phule fought against not exist in India? Is the country free from caste-based prejudices today?

Graham Staines murder convict walks free after 25 years; good day, says VHPMahendra Hembram, one of the convicts in the 1999-murder of Australian missionary Graham Staines and his two minor sons, walked free after spending 25 years behind bars. Hembram's release from jail, granted on grounds of good behaviour, was welcomed by the Vishwa Hindu Parishad.

ED probes Bengaluru breeder who bought Rs 50 crore wolfdogThe ED has launched a probe into Bengaluru's S Satish after his claim of buying a Rs 50 crore wolfdog went viral. He now says he only posed with the dog for photos.

High Court orders case against Tamil Nadu Minister over vulgar joke on HindusThe Madras High Court directed the police to file an FIR against Tamil Nadu Minister K Ponmudi for allegedly making vulgar remarks targeting Saivites, Vaishnavites and women. The court warned suo motu action if its directive was ignored.

YouTuber claims 'fake paneer served' at Gauri Khan's Torii, restaurant reactsA popular YouTuber alleged the use of fake paneer at Gauri Khan's high-end restaurant, Torii. The establishment addressed the claims and issued a response.

21 acres for just 99 paise: Big land allotment to TCS as Andhra bets big on techThe cabinet of Andhra Pradesh cleared the proposal on Tuesday, stating that the project is expected to bring in an investment of around Rs 1,370 crore and create nearly 12,000 jobs.

Move over horses and dogs, Los Angeles is hosting a sperm raceLos Angeles will host the world's first live sperm race on April 25 to raise awareness about male fertility — complete with tracks, replays, betting, and play-by-play commentary.

Mumbai Metro gets mega tunnel breakthrough, route to cut travel time by 60 minsMetro Line 7A is a 3.4-kilometre extension of the existing Line 7, which runs from Dahisar East to Gundavli. The extension will connect the city's metro network to the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport (CSMI).

sports.headline: MI vs SRH: Travis Head's slowest knock in IPL history triggers meme festPL 2025, MI vs SRH: Travis Head managed just 28 off 29 balls, a shadow of his usual aggressive self in Mumbai on Thursday. It was his slowest knock in IPL history as SunRisers Hyderabad huffed and puffed their way to 162 in 20 overs.

MI vs SRH: Travis Head 2nd fastest to 1000 IPL runs on day of his slowest knockSunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) opener Travis Head became the second fastest to complete 1000 runs in IPL history in terms of balls faced on the day he played his slowest knock against Mumbai Indians (MI).

Rohit Sharma shares story behind iconic 'Garden me nahi ghoomna' dialogueIndia captain Rohit Sharma has opened up on his famous 'Koi Garden me nahi ghoomega' dialogue and revealed what prompted him to say that on the field.

Rohit Sharma a permanent impact player? Fans unhappy with MI team combinationIPL 2025, MI vs SRH: A section of Mumbai Indians fans have expressed their disappointment with the five-time champions using their star player, Rohit Sharma, as an Impact Sub. More often than not, the former captain has played as Impact Sub.

Mohammad Rizwan best choice for Pakistan captaincy at the moment: Iftikhar AhmedIftikhar Ahmed has shown his support to under-fire ODI captain Mohammad Rizwan and feels he is the best option for captaincy at the moment. Rizwan has been under heavy criticism after the Pakistan's poor Champions Trophy campaign.

Don't worry, Bumrah is fine: Hardik Pandya on MI pacer's fitness in IPL 2025Mumbai Indians captain Hardik Pandya has said that there are no worries about Jasprit Bumrah's fitness ahead of the clash against Sunrisers Hyderabad. Bumrah missed the initial few games for MI this season.

MI vs SRH Live: Rohit departs for 26 in 163 chaseIPL 2025, Mumbai Indians (MI) vs SunRisers Hyderabad (SRH) live score and updates: Rohit Sharma has got out after a good start against Sunrisers Hyderabad as MI lost their first wicket on 32. The pitch has been a two-paced one with grip and turn on offer for bowlers.

Misplaced trust in Riyan Parag? Fans slam RR for continuous backing of young starRajasthan Royals' (RR) fans slammed their team management for continuously backing the youngster Riyan Parag despite his failure to repay team's trust time and again.

After Mohamed Salah, Liverpool extend Virgil van Dijk's contract till 2027After Mohamed Salah, Liverpool have extended Virgil Van Dijk's contract at the club beyond this season. Van Dijk will remain at Liverpool until 2027 as he signed his new deal on Thursday, April 17.
Golf: PGA Tour suspends Wesley Bryan over LIV-backed eventGolf star Wesley Bryan was suspended from the PGA Tour for participating in 'The Duels: Miami,' a LIV Golf-backed creator event.

Since coming to PBKS, been feeling like a senior in team: Arshdeep SinghPBKS pacer Arshdeep Singh has said that apart from his first season at the franchise, he has felt like a senior in the squad. Arshdeep has been leading Punjab's attack since joining the team in 2019.

MI vs SRH Live: Rohit departs for 26 in 163 chaseIPL 2025, Mumbai Indians (MI) vs SunRisers Hyderabad (SRH) live score and updates: Rohit Sharma has got out after a good start against Sunrisers Hyderabad as MI lost their first wicket on 32. The pitch has been a two-paced one with grip and turn on offer for bowlers.

After Mohamed Salah, Liverpool extend Virgil van Dijk's contract till 2027After Mohamed Salah, Liverpool have extended Virgil Van Dijk's contract at the club beyond this season. Van Dijk will remain at Liverpool until 2027 as he signed his new deal on Thursday, April 17.
Golf: PGA Tour suspends Wesley Bryan over LIV-backed eventGolf star Wesley Bryan was suspended from the PGA Tour for participating in 'The Duels: Miami,' a LIV Golf-backed creator event.

Since coming to PBKS, been feeling like a senior in team: Arshdeep SinghPBKS pacer Arshdeep Singh has said that apart from his first season at the franchise, he has felt like a senior in the squad. Arshdeep has been leading Punjab's attack since joining the team in 2019.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
